focused_learning_info: We will answer any questions regarding the competence of “Bolashaq saraiy”.  This website will help you express your wishes, suggestions, as well as share opinions and have quality feedback in accordance with today’s requirements for additional educational services
tagline_info: Bolashaq saraiy” will allow pupils and students to develop their abilities and talents in the field of art, sports, science, technology, and IT! This interactive resource will be a good platform for a broad discussion on the activities of “Bolashaq Saraiy”.
